contributors.name: Julius Zint, Philip Matesanz, Torben Voltmer

threats.title: Use encryption
threats.description: Unencrypted data sent over a public network may be intercepted and read by an attacker.
threats.mitigation: Data sent over a public network should be encrypted either at the message or transport level.
